price: 3. Waxaa sarreeya Sharafta iyo Haybadda (Alle) Rabbigeen, ma uusan yeelan xaas iyo ilmo midna2.
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَٰحِبَةٗ وَلَا وَلَدٗا
footnotes: 2. Waxay qaarkood rumeysnaayeen jinku inuu Allaah leeyahay xaas iyo ilmo, laakiin kaddib markay soo Islameen waa ka hareen odhaahdaasi xun iyo caqiidadaas gurracan oo ka hufeen Alle inuu leeyahay wiil ama gabdho ama shariigyo.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu taʿālā jaddu rabbinā mā ittakhadha ṣāḥibatan walā waladan
